title: Cartoon favourites. - Volume 2
brief_description: This tape includes 7 cartoons featuring some of your favourite cartoon characters. Stories include; “Rookie revue”; “Porky’s bear facts”; “Jasper and the haunted house”; “A Bout with a trout”; “Scotty finds a home”; “I wanna be a sailor”; and “Mutt and Jeff in westward whoa”. No other production details availble.
